about_the_game:
"СhikPack" is a unique animated clicker game that demonstrates excellent graphics and really engages not only with the beauty of the girls, but also not an easy task that needs to be solved in order to see all the beauty of the work artists.


"СhikPack" - clicker with many beautiful girls for every taste. We tried to recreate for you the atmosphere of a real "Men's Club".
As befits a club, we will only have the most beautiful and unique characters of their kind.
The works of artists will not leave you indifferent...
In working on the game, the artists tried very hard to surpass themselves, to prepare good content for all fans of this genre of games.
Also as a bonus, all girls after passing the level will be available for download.




Our game is a clicker, with solving riddles to get bonuses, and collecting cards with characters.
Each click gives the character the motivation to move faster and more gracefully.
Perfectly selected music and visuals create a unique gaming experience. And after passing the levels, the images of the girls will be available for download.
Please do not judge strictly, this is Our first project of this kind, we will be glad to have constructive criticism and suggestions to improve the quality of Our product...
And also, we invite to cooperation, novice artists, developers and designers to work on the creation of unique content.

content_descriptors.notes:
Movements with elements of nudity of drawn characters of girls, with musical accompaniment.
Sexual assault, non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-harm are NOT in the game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4260U Serise or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4260U Serise or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: ChikPack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 Serise or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: СhikPack - This is a "Men's Club" style clicker with many beautiful girls gathered in one place!
